description: Slim-fitting jeans made from 12.75 oz. Japanese denim. Left-hand twill fabric is yarn-dyed with true indigo. Zip-fly construction. Repaired with contrasting twill and chambray. Paint-splattered. Sanforized® to minimize shrinkage.
fitting_details: Slim Fit: a medium-low rise and a slim thigh and leg.
Size 32W has an 9" rise and a 14.5" leg opening.
Hand-set, chain-stitched waistband with inserted belt loops for added durability. Zip fly with our signature buttoned closure.
American-made buttons, rivets, and washer burrs. Five-pocket styling. "RRL" embroidery at the coin pocket. Natural twill pocket lining.
"RRL"-debossed logo label at the back right waist.
Machine washable. For best results, wear 90 days without washing.
Dyed with true indigo, which may rub off onto fabrics, leather, and upholstery.
